column2: CodeLens links are actionable, meaning you can click on them and something happens.
Git Lens uses the CodeLens UI to show commit information, number of authors, inline blame annotations, and exposes the Peek window for a full history view.
The CodeMetrics extension shows the complexity of functions and allows you to check metrics on the source code you are writing, with customizable descriptions.
The Regex Previewer extension is useful for testing regular expressions quickly.
The Version Lens extension supports many package management systems, shows outdated packages, and allows for quick upgrades with a mouse click.
